mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews ( guest_id, accommodation_id, grade, comment, create_day, update_day ) VALUES ( #{guestId}, #{accommodationId}, #{grade}, #{comment}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET grade = #{grade}, comment = #{comment}, update_day = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, guest_id, accommodation_id, grade, comment, create_day, update_day FROM reviews ORDER BY create_day DESC
SELECT review_id, guest_id, accommodation_id, grade, comment, create_day, update_day FROM reviews WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
SELECT review_id, guest_id, accommodation_id, grade, comment, create_day, update_day FROM reviews WHERE accommodation_id=#{accommodationId}

SELECT r.review_id, r.guest_id, r.accommodation_id, r.grade, r.comment, r.create_day, a.name, a.location FROM reviews r JOIN accommodations a ON r.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE r.guest_id = #{guestId} ORDER BY r.create_day DESC

SELECT r.review_id, r.guest_id, r.accommodation_id, r.grade, r.comment, r.create_day, a.name, a.location FROM reviews r JOIN accommodations a ON r.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE r.review_id = #{reviewId}
